summary: v8.9.6 Coach Vitrine & Non-Regression Testing COMPLETE - All backend tests PASSED (14/14), All frontend verifications PASSED
critical_code_review_comments: v8.9.6 vitrine endpoint implemented correctly at lines 6919-6956
Endpoint searches coach by name, email, or id with case-insensitive regex
Returns 404 if coach not found (correct behavior)
Returns coach profile + offers + courses filtered by coach_id
Frontend CoachVitrine.js component correctly handles loading, error, and success states
App.js correctly detects /coach/[username] route at lines 2171-2186
March courses displayed correctly: Session Cardio (04.03, 11.03, 18.03, 25.03) and Sunday Vibes (01.03, 08.03, 15.03, 22.03)
Coach search icon visible and aligned with filters (data-testid='coach-search-nav-btn')
context_for_next_testing_agent: v8.9.6 COACH VITRINE fully tested. Backend: /api/coach/vitrine/{username} returns coach profile + offers + courses, 404 for unknown coach. Non-regression: courses, offers, reservations all INTACT. Bassi sees 7 reservations. Frontend: /coach/[username] route works, shows 'Coach non trouvé' error for unknown coach with 'Retour' button. March 2025 courses visible (Session Cardio + Sunday Vibes). Coach search icon visible.
